== USERNAME ==
* '''Default:''' <Code></Code>

Used by [[Version Control]] to specify which ''Windows User Accounts'' are allowed to merge into the master [[Data File]].

'''Examples'''
<source lang="ini">
[WhoCanMerge]
Scrivener07=1
</Source>
